statements: SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE PondID = 1;
SELECT FeedType, FeedAmount FROM ProductionData WHERE WaterTemperature > 25;
SELECT PondID, OxygenLevel FROM ProductionData WHERE Date = '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE WaterTemperature < 20 ORDER BY FeedAmount DESC;
SELECT Date, PondID, WaterTemperature FROM ProductionData WHERE OxygenLevel > 5 ORDER BY PondID, Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE FeedAmount > 100 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT PondID, FeedType, WaterTemperature FROM ProductionData WHERE OxygenLevel < 5 AND WaterTemperature > 25;
SELECT DISTINCT PondID, SUM(FeedAmount) AS TotalFeed FROM ProductionData GROUP BY PondID HAVING TotalFeed > 500;
SELECT FeedType, AVG(OxygenLevel) AS AvgOxygenLevel FROM ProductionData WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' GROUP BY FeedType;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE Date = '2022-03-15' AND (WaterTemperature > 20 OR OxygenLevel < 4.5) ORDER BY WaterTemperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT production_id, date, quantity FROM production_data WHERE species='Salmon' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT species, weight FROM production_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT production_id, date, quantity FROM production_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM feeding_strategies WHERE feed_type='Pellets' ORDER BY feeding_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT production_id, species, weight FROM production_data WHERE species = 'Salmon';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM production_data GROUP BY species ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT feeding_time, feed_type FROM feeding_strategies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY feeding_time ASC;
SELECT species, AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM production_data GROUP BY species HAVING AVG(weight) > 50 ORDER BY species;
SELECT * FROM feeding_strategies;
SELECT id, type, amount FROM feeding_strategies WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT fish_species, weight FROM production_data ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_id, MAX(optimization_score) AS max_score FROM yield_optimization GROUP BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM yield_optimization WHERE optimization_score BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT id, type, amount, time FROM feeding_strategies ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE fish_species = 'Salmon' AND weight > 100 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT fs.type, pd.fish_species, yo.optimization_score FROM feeding_strategies fs JOIN yield_optimization yo ON fs.id = yo.strategy_id JOIN production_data pd ON pd.id = yo.production_id WHERE fs.amount > 50 AND yo.optimization_score < 80 ORDER BY yo.optimization_score DESC, fs.amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM feeding_strategies;
SELECT fish_species, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM production_data GROUP BY fish_species HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY species_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_operations;
SELECT operation_date, location FROM aquaculture_operations WHERE water_temperature > 25;
SELECT recipe_name, protein_content, fat_content FROM feed_recipe;
SELECT * FROM feeding_logs WHERE amount_fed > 10;
SELECT species_name, optimal_temperature, optimal_ph FROM fish_species WHERE optimal_temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_operations WHERE water_temperature > 28.0 ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT operation_id, location FROM aquaculture_operations WHERE operation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT species_name, optimal_temperature, optimal_ph FROM fish_species WHERE optimal_temperature < 25.0 AND optimal_ph > 7.0 ORDER BY species_name;
SELECT recipe_name, protein_content, fat_content FROM feed_recipe WHERE protein_content >= 20.0 AND fat_content < 10.0 ORDER BY fat_content ASC;
SELECT operation_id, feeding_time, amount_fed FROM feeding_logs WHERE amount_fed BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0 ORDER BY feeding_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM feeding_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT feed_type, quantity FROM feeding_schedule WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT species, quantity FROM fish_stock WHERE average_weight > 2.5;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM water_quality WHERE ph_level < 7.0;
SELECT fish_id, feed_time, consumed_quantity FROM feeding_logs WHERE fish_id = 1 ORDER BY feed_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM feeding_schedule ORDER BY date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species, quantity FROM fish_stock WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality WHERE temperature > 25 AND ph_level < 7 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT fish_id, SUM(consumed_quantity) AS total_consumed FROM feeding_logs GROUP BY fish_id ORDER BY total_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, fish_id, total_weight FROM harvest_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_weight DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
